TopicTitle: Keeping satelites aligned to the object which they are orbiting?

Articles.Content:
How do I get the satellites, probes, capsules or everything else aligned to a specific direction?

I mean, how I get the boost for the right spin to the satellite so they will keep stable in direction relative to the object they are orbiting? (like our moon)
I think it should be a ASAS option tbh.
There is such option in MechJeb, but not in the original game.
